dt: {bc}an act or instance of {d_link|packaging|package:2} something or someone: such as
{bc}the enclosing of something in a container or covering

dt.t: … damage caused by static charge during {wi}packaging{/wi}, storing, and shipping.

dt: {bc}the presentation of something or someone to the public in a way that is designed to be attractive or appealing

dt.t: This is public relations: the {wi}packaging{/wi} of ideas, the execution of them, and the media coverage surrounding them.

dt: {bc}material used to enclose or contain something

dt.t: … the flashy {wi}packaging{/wi} popularized by mass merchants.

shortdef: an act or instance of packaging something or someone: such as
the enclosing of something in a container or covering
the presentation of something or someone to the public in a way that is designed to be attractive or appealing

dt: {bc}to present (something, such as a product) in such a way as to heighten its appeal to the public
{bc}to enclose in a package or covering

shortdef: to make into a package; especially : to produce as an entertainment package
to present (something, such as a product) in such a way as to heighten its appeal to the public
to enclose in a package or covering
